article:

available to the majority. Some received none.
  Even though  we were there to help, the trauma  made some callers rude. Some were   _  . Some were suicidal . It was hard to stay  _  and encouraging. Just at that time, I got a call from Brenda.

"I know that recovery lies ahead," she continued. "I  _  that

The only thing Brenda could  _  was her attitude. She made a
